1.content:
In the Hollywood district of Los Angeles there is a performing arts high school named Hollywood Arts. An exceptional high school full of remarkably talented students, each of which had to prove their worth in an audition just to be admitted.

While in many ways, the students at Hollywood Arts still participate in the universal high school experience, it is undeniable that collecting the extraordinary all together creates a student body that makes weird the new normal.

This LA high school fully embraces and encourages the unique student populace and does its best to help cultivate an environment in which the students are able to thrive in all aspects of their life, especially creatively.

One student of Hollywood Arts, Cat Valentine, became quite obsessed with a magazine catalog called Sky Store, where she ordered all kinds of improbable and strange things not likely found in any local stores. Her obsession with Sky Store became a problem and had to be quelled, but in the process she brought the magazine to the attention of all her friends and many of her acquaintances.

Someone just received a package shipped from Sky Store, who?
1.title: Welcome to Hollywood Arts

11.content: So one of the girls just got a package shipped to them from Sky Store. Which girl?
11.title: Victorious Girls

111.content:
On a warm Sunday evening in her LA home, Tori Vega was surprised to find a package waiting at her door. Upon picking it up, however, she realized it may not be a surprise she was totally excited to get.

The package had the Sky Store logo emblazoned on its side, and since she herself hadn't ordered anything, it meant Cat had sent it to her. In truth, she rarely bought anything from the Sky Store. The few times she bothered looking through the magazine, it seemed like an unorganized collection of random odd items and weird inventions, most of which seemed to have extremely niche usage.

Her best friend Cat Valentine, however, had gone through a bit of an obsession phase with Sky Store. With the help of her friends, she managed to kick the obsessive habit...sort of. She was no longer buying multiple items a day and racking up extreme credit card debt for her parents, but she still bought things from time to time.

Occasionally she bought her friends things, too, which would be sweet if it weren't at risk of bringing her problem back. Not to mention, Tori thought, it was rare for her to be very thrilled with the oddities that Cat bought her. Still, it would be rude to not at least investigate, for Cat's sake.

Tori sat on the red sofa in her living room and opened the box to inspect its contents. There were a few items inside, most of which were just the usual weird stuff. But one item in particular caught Tori's attention as something truly unique, if it could be believed to be real.

It had a small receipt next to it, which revealed from a quick scan that it was a unique item that could only be purchased by exchanging Sky Miles from frequent purchases. And it looks like Cat cashed in a lot of Sky Miles to get this thing. Tori wasn't even totally sure if she was supposed to receive it, Cat may have included it with Tori's items by mistake. What was this strange, unique item?

1. A bottle with red liquid inside. Labeled as a shrinking serum.

2. A bottle with blue liquid inside. Labeled as a growth serum.

3. A strangely-shaped metal pistol that looks like some sort of sci-fi ray gun. Tori hadn't looked at the label yet, though.
111.title: Tori Vega

1111.content:
Tori pulled out a clear glass bottle filled with a transparent, bright red liquid. The label on the front said, "Shrinking Serum" and the smaller text underneath read, "Strawberry-flavored!"

Tori didn't really believe it was actually a shrinking serum of course, that would be ridiculous. Probably just some cute strawberry drink marketing, like if it had been called a health potion from an RPG or something.

Tori twisted off the cap and brought the opening under her nose. It had a very potent strawberry scent. She brought the bottle to her lips and started to tilt it back to drink, but paused.

Why did it cost so many Sky Miles? She didn't fully understand the value of a Sky Mile but the number was extremely high. Should she really be drinking this?

1. Tori shrugs off her doubt, she's being silly. She drinks the liquid.

2. Tori is...unsure. Trina's upstairs, maybe she can just have her try it first.

3. Tori decides to wait to do anything with it. She'll take it with her to school tomorrow just in case and see if she gets any ideas.
1111.title: Shrinking Serum

11111.content:
Tori ignores the thought, she's being overly paranoid. She's almost embarrassed, but no one has to know she almost believed the silly marketing.

She tilted the bottle back and drank some of the so-called "Shrink Serum." It had a very pleasant flavor, very strawberry as promised. And as far as artificial strawberry went, it didn't overwhelm her with its artificiality. It was so good it even earned an audible "Mmmm" from her.

Tori twisted the cap back on, walked to the kitchen, and put the bottle in the fridge. She only took a single drink from the bottle and figured it may be better refrigerated.

As she walked back into the living room, a strange feeling overtook her. Her whole body started to tingle and she almost felt like she wasn't in her own skin, sort of like the feeling when your hand or foot falls asleep. Her whole body felt that way, and her vision swam.

Everything in her vision seemed to fall away, but upwards. She felt like she was falling, but without the panic or feeling of danger. It was rapid, and then it was over.

Tori's body regained feeling, and she realized she had fallen on her back. But she was immediately confused, because she quickly noticed she was nude. The ground she lay on was uneven, and felt soft, like a large blanket. And it was maroon, just like the shirt she was wearing before she...

Oh no.

Tori quickly stood up, and looked around her. The red material went on for several yards, and dropped off. The ground below that level looked like an ever expansive wooden floor, but with much larger grain patterns than she was used to. Of course, looking beyond the ground confirmed her fear. Giant furniture.

Tori was mortified. The shrinking serum was so expensive because it was real! She was standing on her own clothes, that she shrunk right out of. She felt so small, helpless, and exposed.

She did her best to walk along the uneven surface of her shirt, finding it surprisingly difficult as there was no telling how far each footstep would sink into the folds of fabric. Once she reached the edge, she jumped the short distance and landed on the hardwood floor of her living room. She was between the couch and the rug, trying to decide which direction she should head.

However, someone enters the room. Who is it?
11111.title: Tiny Tori

choices: There is a knock at the door that drowns Tori out
111111.content:
Tori heard a faint sound that rapidly grew louder and louder. It was an unpleasant noise, but eventually she was able to identify it. It seemed to echo through the air, constantly changing, but always sounding off.

It was Trina's singing. Tori looked towards the stairs, where the overwhelming noise originated. She was shocked at how terrifying Trina looked. At Tori's size, from this distance, Trina's casual movement down the stairs looked like a distant titan descending from the heavens themselves. The stairs were so far away from her scale that they may as well have been skyscrapers on the horizon, but now there's a god-sized being descending them.

As Trina reached the bottom of the stairs and headed into the living room, Tori felt fear strike her heart as she could feel the vibrations with every step. Trina was unbelievably massive, her mind could hardly comprehend their size difference.

Trina was dressed very comfortably, wearing a large, loose-fitting shirt, sweatpants, and fuzzy slippers. The giantess walked over Tori, and sat down on the couch, her huge slippered feet resting on the ground, yards apart on either side of her.

"Ugh, Tori left her clothes just lying in the living room? What a slob," Trina remarked with annoyance. Her voice was so loud to Tori, it seemed to travel through the air as practically a roar.

Tori ignored the comment, and tried yelling up to her giant sister from the floor hoping she could hear her and get her some help.

Does Trina hear her bug-sized sister on the floor?
111111.title: Titanic Trina

1111111.content:
Trina slid off her fuzzy purple slippers, her giant bare feet now on either side of Tori, massive toes wiggling. Tori's ears are assaulted by a ear-shattering cracking sound as Trina's huge tan toes scrunch inwards intently, cracking her toe knuckles.

Tori looked at her sister's huge bare feet with disgust on her face. Ugh, gross, she didn't want to be anywhere near Trina's feet. She wished she would put her slippers back on.

Tori could see Trina pull out her PearPhone and begin to text. Perfect, she thought. She was worried Trina would turn on the TV, and then it would be impossible for Trina to hear her.

Tori shouted her lungs out at her giant sister from the hardwood floor down below. She kept yelling her name, as well as indiscriminately yelling just hoping she could make her voice loud enough. As a singer, she had faith in her powerful vocal cords.

Occasionally, Trina's feet would move or shuffle slightly, and Tori grew nervous as they seemed to slowly come closer over time. The longer she spent down here near Trina's feet, the more she began to notice a stink slowly permeating the air.

Tori mostly stared up at Trina while she yelled, waiting for the moment she saw her big sister's gaze finally turn towards the ground. But she couldn't help but steal glances to her left and right, seeing the monolithic peds shift in her peripheral vision. Watching such huge toes, most probably bigger than her, wiggle and shift and occasionally seem to try and crawl closer, set her on edge.

Just as Tori's voice was growing hoarse and she began to doubt if she'd be able to go on, Trina's eyes finally flickered to the floor, and seemed to focus on where Tori was standing. Tori was ecstatic, she jumped and cheered, yelling, "Yes! Trina, down here, it's me!"

Trina's facial expression was confusion, and she peered closer. Tori assumed she just had a hard time processing what she was seeing.

What was Trina seeing?
1111111.title: Calling Out to Her Sister

choices: Nope, Tori is squished like the bug she is
11111112.content:
Trina's a face turned to disgust. "Ew, gross, a bug," she said, speaking about her very own little sister.

Tori's heart skipped a beat upon hearing those words. Oh no oh no, this is the worst-case scenario! "Trina, no! It's me, Tori! It's your sister! I am not a bug!" Tori shouted like her life depended on it, because it did. Unfortunately, her voice had grown quite hoarse from all the yelling she'd already been doing.

Tori's heart seized with fear as she saw the gigantic foot to her left slide closer and lift into the air. It was brought directly over her, her huge sister's tan bare sole becoming her new sky.

It was a moment of terrifying clarity. She thought her life was supposed to flash in front of her eyes, but instead her mind seemed to slow down time so she could take in every detail of this moment. The exact shape of the giant sole looming over her, ready to remove her from this world. The round toes that would be cute if they weren't so huge and threatening. Every crease in the skin where Trina's foot flesh could fold if need be. The swirls in Trina's toe prints. The way that the foot looked mostly clean, cast in slight shadow from indirect light, yet still being able to see flecks of dirt and almost imperceptible spots of grime here and there, and even microbeads of sweat clinging in several different places.

The way Tori's mind captured this moment so perfectly, you would think she had seen God for the first time. In way, Trina's foot was sort of like a god to her in this moment. It loomed above, massive, incomprehensible. And it judged her. It judged her, and deemed her unfit for this world, so now it was taking it upon itself to remove her from it.

You could potentially argue that, but nope. This was just her big sister's smelly foot. And Tori was the bug about to be squashed beneath it.

The moment ended and Tori could only take a single step back as the monolith of foot flesh descended upon her. It crashed down, an unstoppable force crushing her in a way similar to how she thought being hit by a meteor might feel.

She was surprised to find that she lived long enough to discover that Trina's soft, fleshy foot even had some give. As she was pressed between the hardwood floor and her sister's skin, she felt her body pressed into Trina's foot, rather than just exploding immediately and letting Trina's foot reach all the way to floor.

It was not a pleasant position by any means. The pressure was immeasurable, Tori thought it a miracle she was still alive. Such intense contact and friction between Trina's foot and her entire body meant she could feel the grime rubbing off from Trina's foot and onto her. And the microbeads of sweat coalesced and squelched between their two skins, coating Tori from head to toe in a light sheen of sweat. Though being covered in foot dirt and foot sweat was the least of her worries, as her life was about to be snuffed out.

Or was it? Is it possible that she shrinking serum made Tori too durable to be crushed?
11111112.title: Treated Like a Bug

111111122.content:
Tori's entire body was completely encased between her sister's massive sole and their living room hardwood floor beneath her. It was incredibly warm, and there was a definite scent of feet. She felt somewhat moist, from the incredibly light sheen of sweat from Trina's foot.

Tori couldn't picture a more humiliating way to die. Being squished like a bug was horrible all on its own, but to die under her sister's stinky foot was the icing on the awful cake.

She felt as if she were rising, and gravity began to tug on her as the ground fell away from her. Her connection to the unbearably warm foot flesh began to weaken, and her body peeled away and fell what felt like ten or so feet.

The impact hurt, but she was more focused on the massive foot looming over her lifting away. Tori realized what had just happened, she had been stuck to Trina's foot. Gross.

Trina's face came into view, peeking into vision miles above from behind the giant sole. Her face was filled with disgust, as she looked right at Tori.

"Yuck, it's still alive," Trina said, still viewing Tori as no more than a bug.

Trina didn't offer her any more words, she didn't feel a bug deserved such. All Tori saw next was the foot coming down at light speed and then nothing.

Her last ten minutes, Tori lived as a bug. She became the size of a bug, Trina identified her as a bug, and then she squished her like a bug. Tori may be the one who shrunk herself, but in the end, Trina's the one who made her a bug.

The bug formerly known as Tori Vega was squished under her big sister's foot.
111111122.title: Just Squishing a Bug

choices: Tori takes the drink to school tomorrow
1112.content:
Tori pulled out a clear glass bottle filled with a transparent, blue liquid. The label on the front said, "Growth Serum" and the smaller text underneath read, "Blueberry-flavored!"

Tori didn't really believe it was actually a growth serum of course, that would be ridiculous. Probably just some cute blueberry drink marketing, like if it had been called a mana potion from an RPG or something.

Tori twisted off the cap and brought the opening under her nose. It had a very potent blueberry scent. She brought the bottle to her lips and started to tilt it back to drink, but paused.

Why did it cost so many Sky Miles? She didn't fully understand the value of a Sky Mile but the number was extremely high. Should she really be drinking this?

1. Tori shrugs off her worry. It's ridiculous to think something like that existed. Besides, even if it theoretically worked, it'd probably just make her a couple inches taller, right? What's the harm in that? Tori drinks the liquid.

2. Tori still has doubt...she'll just take the tiniest sip just to assuage her paranoia.

3. Tori decides to wait, and just take it to school tomorrow. Maybe she'll get a friend to try it, so they can make her feel stupid for believing it could be real.
1112.title: Growth Serum

1113.content:
Tori lifted the strange gun out of the box. It had a surprising amount of heft. Seeing its weird design, she would have expected it to be made of plastic, but lifting it and getting a better look at it confirmed it was undoubtedly made of metal.

It looked very similar to some sort of goofy sci-fi ray gun. The majority of it was made of metal, but it had a slim design, a grooved rubber grip, and the barrel was long and thin, with colored loops spaced along its length. At the end of of the thing barrel was a small purple orb, colored to match the rings and the colored grip.

There was some lettering on the side, which read...
1113.title: Ray Gun

11131.content:
The lettering on the side read "Size Ray," and next to it, near the back of the gun, was a dial that could be turned to one of two options, apparently. "S" and "G." The dial was currently set to "S."

A size ray, huh? So it like, changes the sizes of things? ....or people. Tori smiled with thoughts of mischief running through her head. She had to test this thing out, but on whom? Trina was home, so maybe her. Or perhaps one of her friends. Or maybe she should try it on herself just a little bit, to make sure it worked before making a fool of herself in front of someone else.

Who does Tori try out the Size Ray on?
11131.title: Size Ray

11132.content:
"What the heck is a change ray?" Tori wondered aloud to herself, a look of clear confusion plastered on her face.

When she wrapped her fingers around the grip, she could almost feel a slight buzzing in her hand. It was difficult for her to place the feeling, but it almost felt like she was connected to it. She couldn't quite explain how she knew, but she was sure it was taking some sort of input from her besides just from the trigger.

Checking inside the box, Tori found a small note that had been lying underneath the ray gun. It read, "Change Ray, change anyone into anything." Smaller text underneath read, "Not harmful to people. Not all forms possible."

"Change anyone into anything?" Tori said to herself, musing over the slogan. "Huh, I wonder who I should try it on..."

Who does Tori try out her Change Ray on?

1. Trina would be fun. If it actually works, it sounds like a good prank to use on her obnoxious older sister.

2. One of her friends, just to mess with them. She could try it on Cat, since she gave it to her. Or maybe Robbie, since he's the most fun to mess with. Or Jade, since they've got a sort of frenemy relationship going.

3. Maybe she should try it out on herself first, just to see if it's safe.
11132.title: Change Ray

112.content:
Trina Vega lay on the red couch in her LA home, lazily watching television. The doorbell rang, and Trina called out, "You'll get it!" to her little sister, who was in the kitchen.

Tori grumbled and made her way to the front door and opened it, giving Trina a scowl while she continued to watch TV.

"Trina, it's a package for you," Tori said, picking up a box and closing the door. "It's from Sky Store."

Trina sat up, her interest piqued. She took the box from her sister, which indeed had the Sky Store logo on the side. Tori peered over her shoulder while she opened the box.

Inside there was an assortment of odd items, though some were instantly recognizable, such as a whoopee cushion.

"What did you order?" Tori asked, clearly perplexed by the contents of the box.

"It's a Prank Box. It's full of stuff I can use to mess with people. You know Mandy Dehaney?" Trina asked, while rifling through the box's contents.

"Uh, yeah, I know of her," Tori said, eyes still fixed on the curious contents of the box as Trina pulled several things out. She took a seat next to her sister and began inspecting one of the set aside objects pulled from the box.

"She just started dating Ian Jensen," Trina explained, setting more things to the side.

"The senior?" Tori queried, while reading the label of some prank toothpaste that apparently turned your teeth neon green for twenty-four hours.

"The senior," Trina confirmed. "I want to date him, so I have to humiliate Mandy in front of him so he'll dump her, then he can date me."

Tori looked skeptical, but decided not to say anything. "Some of this stuff seems really weird, is it all safe?"

"Yeah yeah I'm sure it'll be fine," Trina said dismissively, pulling out something interesting.

What did Trina find?

1. A bottle with red liquid inside. Labeled as a shrinking serum.

2. A bottle with blue liquid inside. Labeled as a growth serum.

3. A strangely-shaped metal pistol that looks like some sort of sci-fi ray gun.
112.title: Trina Vega

choices: She'll just take a sip herself and see what happens
She'll trick Tori into drinking some to see if it works
She'll just risk it and trick Mandy into drinking it
1121.content:
Trina pulls out a glass bottle filled with a transparent red liquid, labeled, "Shrinking Serum." Smaller letters underneath read, "Strawberry flavored!" Some weird shrink potion seemed like a perfect way to humiliate Mandy.

But Trina considered that maybe she should prove it worked first. What's her idea?
1121.title: Shrinking Serum

choices: No testing, time to devise a plan
1122.content:
Trina pulls out a glass bottle filled with a transparent blue liquid, labeled, "Growth Serum." Smaller letters underneath read, "Blueberry flavored!" Trina considered how this might actually help her...

Maybe she could grow really tall and Ian would leave Mandy for her. Unless Ian didn't like tall girls...then she could slip it in Mandy's drink and make her grow instead!

Trina eyed the bottle and realized she had no idea how much it would grow you, or if different amounts had different effects. Should she test it?

1. Trina decides to take a sip of it first to see what happens.

2. Trina makes Tori take a sip to see what happens.

3. Trina doesn't bother, she'll just go through with one of her plans.
1122.title: Growth Serum

1123.content:
Trina lifted what sort of looked like a gun out of the box. Tori's eyes went wide upon seeing it, jumping between the strange gun and her sister.

"What on earth is that?" Tori asked, incredulous. "Is that a gun?"

Trina wasn't quite sure what it was, but she knew it wasn't a regular gun based on its odd appearance. It was mostly made of metal, and had a grooved, purple grip. The barrel was long and thin, with small discs spaced evenly along its length, with a small orb at the end of the barrel. The discs and the orb were a similar shade of purple as the grip.

"No, but it looks like a weird, nerdy gun from those dumb old movies," Trina said. She was ready to just fire it at something and see if anything happened, but she noticed some off-white lettering etched on the side near the back.

What did it say?
1123.title: Ray Gun

choices: Yeah, she shoots Tori with it
Yeah, she shoots herself with it
No, she'll save it for Mandy. What if it has limited charges?
11231.content:
The lettering on the side read "Size Ray," and next to it, near the back of the gun, was a dial that could be turned to one of two options, apparently. "S" and "G." The dial was currently set to "S."

Trina was far from the brightest bulb but this seemed pretty straightforward to her. A weird sci-fi gun that could supposedly change the size of things.

It seemed perfect for use on Mandy Dehaney. However, she wondered if she should test it out to make sure it worked first. It would be embarrassing if she was caught looking like an idiot trying to use this thing.

Should Trina test this gun out first?
11231.title: Size Ray

choices: Trina tells Tori about the Change Ray
11232.content:
As Trina held the Change Ray in her hand, she could feel a weird sort of buzzing connection between her hand and the gun. It felt connected to her, in a way she couldn't explain.

While Tori sifted through more of the package's contents, Trina spent a minute handling this gun. As she held it, the connection started to become more apparent. She noticed that when objects came into her mind, the gun seemed to prime those thoughts, as its ammunition, she felt.

It seemed like nonsense, and beyond Trina's comprehension, yet she couldn't deny that somehow she had intuitively began to sense the way the gun functioned.

She noticed a small slip of paper on the floor beneath her, and picked it up. It was long and thin, and may have been attached to the gun, now that she thought about it. The paper read, "Change Ray, change anyone into anything." Smaller text underneath read, "Not harmful to people. Not all forms possible."

This information, combined with what she had intuited gave Trina the full understanding of what this Change Ray could do, assuming it was for real.

"So what is that weird gun?" Tori asked, after noticing Trina had been checking it out this whole time.

Does Trina explain her findings to Tori?

1. Yes, Trina tells Tori what she discovered.

2. No, Trina lies and makes something mundane up, and keeps the Change Ray a secret.

3. Instead of telling Tori anything, Trina instead decides to show her by firing it at her and hoping that it works.
11232.title: Change Ray

113.content:
Cat Valentine sat at her desk in her pink-walled room, browsing TheSlap.com. She liked and commented on many of her friends' posts, but she had been growing bored. So she closed TheSlap and instead clicked on her second most-used bookmark, the Sky Store's online shop.

Cat sat in her chair, giggling with glee while browsing the various silly wares they offer. After repressing the urge to buy absolutely everything she came across for a full ten minutes, she switched over to their Sky Mile selection. Every time she made a purchase she earned Sky Miles, and there was a section of their online shop that sold items that could only be purchased with Sky Miles.

Many of the items were enticing, but Cat finally saw something that piqued her interest more than any other item. It would cost a lot of Sky Miles, but it definitely seemed worth it. She read and reread the description twice just to make sure it really was what she thought it was. When she was certain it was exactly what she hoped, she clicked "Buy Now" and confirmed the use of her Sky Miles.

Since Cat was a Sky Store Premium Member and the package was small enough, the website informed her she could expect her package in thirty minutes by drone. Ecstatic, she began playing music and jamming out while she waited for her package to arrive.

After the half hour had passed, she heard a buzzing at her window, and opened it. A flying drone with her package attached to the bottom flew into her room, dropped the package on the floor, and then flew away, leaving Cat staring in shock. She was tempted to post about the amazing experience on TheSlap, but she was too eager to open her package.

What did Cat order?
113.title: Cat Valentine

1131.content:
Cat opened the box and took out the only thing in it. A glass bottle filled with a transparent, bright-red liquid. The label on the bottle proudly proclaimed it as a shrinking serum, just as Cat had ordered.

"Ooh, it's strawberry-flavored, yum!" Cat said excitedly. She wanted to taste it right away, but she had better plans for the bottle. So she placed it in her school bag and went to bed for the night, thinking about what she would do with it tomorrow at school.

---

Cat walked into Hollywood Arts the next day, brimming with glee. The shrinking serum was in her bag, and she planned to use it.

What was her plan?

1. Surprise one of her friends by shrinking herself around them.

2. Sneak the serum into one of her friends' drinks.

3. Sneak the serum into the boys' drinks and give them to all the girls.
1131.title: Shrinking Serum

11311.content:
Cat figured it was obvious being shrunken was way more fun than watching someone else shrink, so she was eager to drink the serum herself. Not to mention it sounded delicious, being strawberry-flavored and all.

So of course she planned to shrink herself, but around whom?
11311.title: Cat Wants to Be Small

113111.content:
Cat figured she shares most of her weird discoveries with Tori first, so this should be no exception.

When she walked through the hall, she saw Tori at her locker. She ran up to her friend in excitement.

"Tori!" she exclaimed. Tori turned, eyes wide, and greeted Cat with a smile, laugh, and reply in kind.

"Cat!" she responded. "What are you so excited about?" Tori asked her, curious about Cat's extra-enthusiastic greeting.

"I have something to show you! Can I come over to your house after school?" Cat asked, figuring Tori's house was the perfect place to show off her new acquisition.

"Sure Cat, I can't wait to find out what you're so excited to show me," Tori responded, genuinely curious.

Cat made it through the school day, honestly forgetting about her plans. It was easy for her to get distracted, so her mind left the serum hiding in her backpack.

Still, she remembered to visit Tori's house after school. Tori gladly welcomed her inside, and told Cat she'd be back in a minute. Tori went upstairs, leaving Cat in the living room.

Cat opened her backpack and saw the bottle inside. "Oh yeah, how could I forget!" she said with great surprise, giggling. She took out the bottle, uncapped it, and took a big drink.

The strawberry flavor was so delicious, Cat almost wanted to down the whole bottle, but she was hoping to get to use it more than once, so she put the cap back on and stuck it in her bag.

"Mmm, that was really yummy-" Cat had started to say, but then she felt the process begin. Her whole body went tingly, and her vision began to swim. She had an intense feeling of falling for a couple of seconds, and then finally her vision came back to normal and she regained feeling again.

"Oh no!" Cat exclaimed. It was dark, for some reason. And there was a scent of...her, it smelled like her, but there was something else to it.. She tried to move around but could make very little progress, there seemed to be fabric all around her. As she struggled she realized she was no longer wearing any of her clothes, so it was obvious what had happened.

Cat continued to struggle to find a way out of her clothes, while she heard faint booming sounds in the distance. They grew closer and more intense, until she could feel slight vibrations in the fabric she was trapped in with every boom.

"Cat?" she heard, only just barely muffled, loud from above. It was Tori's voice. The booming sound got even closer, until it sounded like it was really close.

"Oh my gosh, what the heck?" she heard Tori's thunderous voice from above. The sound of fabric rubbing against fabric was louder than Cat expected it would be, and then light finally entered her area. There wasn't much to see, as her vision was filled with pink-filtered light. The fabric around her could just barely be seen through, especially this close up, so she could vaguely see the outline of her giant friend above.

"Uhhh, Cat? Why are...all of your clothes on the floor?" Tori called out loudly, obviously sounding very concerned. Cat pushed against the pink material, finally pushing it aside and finding an opening she could walk out of.

Above her, Tori stood like a mountain, a goddess. She was massive, it was unbelievable. And it was something she could never have seen without that serum, so she was glad she bought it. Cat looked below and behind her, to see what pink clothing had trapped her, then she felt slightly embarrassed. She had been trapped inside of her own panties.

Cat tried yelling up to Tori. Does her friend hear her?

1. Yes, Tori hears Cat and is quite surprised to see her friend naked and shrunken standing in a pile of her own clothes.

2. No, Tori doesn't hear Cat and continues looking for her, Cat has to figure out how to get her attention.

3. No, Tori is weirded out by Cat's clothes all sitting in her living room so she takes them to her room for her. In the process, Cat is bunched back up into her panties and she's trapped there for now.
113111.title: Tiny Cat at Tori's

choices: Tori has a job for Cat
1131111.content:
Cat yelled up to Tori, who seemed to hear her, as she looked around for a moment, her face full of confusion. Then finally Tori looked down, and her eyes fell right on Cat. Tori dropped Cat's shirt that she had picked up, which fell to the ground not far from Cat, somewhat startling her as she feared the large garment falling back onto her.

Tori got down on her knees and got closer to Cat, to really get a good look at her. Cat grew nervous as her gigantic friend got so close to her, and then realized she was still naked. Embarrassed, Cat did her best to cover herself with her hands.

Tori, whose face appeared only a couple dozen feet away from Cat's scale, studied her friend's tiny body in detail. Cat thought shrinking so small would be fun, but now she's thinking it's a little scary. She thought they could play and be silly, but the reality is much different. Tori's size is truly intimidating to her, she hadn't pictured her seeming so...powerful.

Tori's face displayed a mix of confusion and concern. "Cat? Is that you? Why are you small?" she asked, genuinely surprised.

"I bought a shrinking potion from Sky Store!" Cat called back up to her, "I thought it would be fun! Now I'm not so sure, my clothes didn't even shrink with me. I got trapped in my own panties!" Cat confessed, embarrassed.

Cat's anecdote broke the tension a little and Tori giggled slightly, "Aw, that's kind of adorable," she said, poking the tiny redhead's body. As the giant digit collided with Cat, it easily shoved her over. Cat fell back into the folds of her panties, before picking herself back up. Tori giggled at the sight.

"It'll be okay, Cat," Tori assured her tiny friend, "Because..."

What does Tori say?

1. "Because I'm going to make sure we do all kinds of fun stuff while you're small, whatever you want!"

2. "Because you look so cute like this, don't worry, I'll keep you and look after you."

3. "Because you're the perfect size, I have just the job for you."
1131111.title: Tori's Discovery

choices: Cat just shrinks herself in the hallway to see who finds her first
Cat shrinks outside her improv class and sneaks inside while tiny
Cat considers other people she can shrink near
113113.content:
Thinking about her options, she considered maybe she could just shrink herself in the hallway and see who comes along. Or maybe right after improv class with all her friends, maybe she could sneak around and see what class is like all teensy.

Or maybe she should just keep thinking about people she may want to shrink around.

What does she decide on?
113113.title: Where to Shrink?

choices: Drink it now and have lots of fun as a giant
Sneak it into one of her friend's drinks at lunch so they unexpectedly grow
Sneak it into multiple friends' drinks, possibly including her own
1132.content:
Cat opened the box and took out the only thing in it. A glass bottle filled with a transparent, blue liquid. The label on the bottle proudly proclaimed it as a growth serum, just as Cat had ordered.

"Ooh, it's blueberry-flavored, yum!" Cat said excitedly. She wanted to taste it right away, but she had better plans for the bottle. So she placed it in her school bag and went to bed for the night, thinking about what she would do with it tomorrow at school.

---

Cat walked into Hollywood Arts the next day, brimming with glee. The growth serum was in her bag, and she planned to use it.

What was her plan?
1132.title: Growth Serum

1133.content:
Cat opened the box and lifted the heavy ray gun from its mold. It looked just like a a sci-fi ray gun from an old movie. It was made mostly out of metal, and it had a grooved, purple grip as well as a long, thin barrel with little purple discs evenly spaced along its length. At the end of the thin barrel was a small purple orb, presumably where the ray fired from.

What was the ray gun advertised as on the Sky Store site?

Size Ray
The Size Ray is capable of changing the size of almost anything! It can shrink or grow living or non-living matter. It is safe and humane but a powerful tool that she be kept away from children! Some limits may apply to upper and lower limits of size.

Change Ray
Change anyone into anything! The Change Ray is capable of changing the shape and form of living things. Change your friend into a dog! Change your dog into a brick! The Change Ray is not harmful to people, however it should be noted that even when changed into non-living objects and materials, people retain consciousness and their senses, so caution is advised. Keep out of reach of children, unless you have a strong desire to become a doll or lego brick.

Note: Non-living materials cannot be changed into living entities, except in the cases in which they started that way.
1133.title: Ray Gun

choices: Cat shrinks one of her friends
Cat shrinks all of her friends
Cat shrinks all of her friends and herself
11331.content:
Cat giggled with glee as she held the size ray in her hands. She couldn't wait to use it on her friends! They would look so cute all teensy tiny!

Cat laughed to herself, imagining it, while fiddling with the dial. It had two settings, "S" and "G." She flipped it back and forth, muttering "flip...flop" each time she changed it from one to the other and back.

Eventually she set it back to "S" and stuffed it in her backpack to take to school tomorrow. She excitedly got ready for bed, wishing it could be the next day already.

---

When Cat got to school the next day, she marched over to her friends quite happily, a smile beaming on her face. She was ready to enact her plan. But what was her plan?

1. Cat wants to lure one of her friends away and shrink them alone, to play with.

2. Cat wants to shrink all of her friends and take them home to play with.

3. Cat wants to shrink all of her friends and herself so they can have a fun adventure together inside their giant high school.
11331.title: Size Ray

11332.content:
Cat held the Change Ray and marveled at the strange sensation of the almost electric connection between her hand and the gun. The Sky Store website claimed it would turn things into whatever you want, and since there was no way to input anything in the ray except the trigger to fire, she assumed it must somehow be connected to her mind.

She giggled at the thought of being able to turn her friends into anything she felt like. She stuffed the ray gun in her backpack and went to bed, excited about the prospects of tomorrow.

---

The next day, Cat arrived at Hollywood Arts, excited to finally try out her new toy. Who is she thinking of trying it out on first?
11332.title: Change Ray

114.content:
Jade West was at her locker in Hollywood Arts, putting some books away. She was approached by a man with a package under one arm and a clipboard in the other.

"Jade West?" the man asked her, looking unsure as he approached.

"Maybe," she replied, indifferently. She hardly even looked at him, preferring to ignore he was even there.

"I've got a package from Sky Store for you," he said, a little nervous. Even some grown adults naturally feared Jade, she just had that effect on people.

Upon hearing what he said, however, her demeanor changed. She looked at the man, with a smile of excitement. "Ooh, my scissors," she purred, suddenly enthusiastic. Well, enthusiastic for Jade. This seemed to make the man even more nervous.

He cautiously handed him his clipboard, saying, "I need your signature...p-please." Jade took the clipboard and quickly scribbled something and handed it back. He handed her the package, and then looked at his clipboard. The line she was supposed to sign had a couple of harsh expletives instead of her name.

"U-um, ma'am, you're supposed to sign your-"

"Go!" Jade barked, cutting the man off. He bolted in terror, completely intimidated by the scariest high school girl he'd ever met.

"Nice shorts!" she called after him, with a smirk. Jade quickly opened her Sky Store package and was delighted with its contents. It was a complex set of four-headed scissors. Quite the complicated design, but it looked intimidating, and if operated correctly, could cut four things at once. She was delighted.

But the box seemed awfully big just for her scissors. Investigating it, she noticed there was a smaller box inside, of which her scissors were lying on top of.

There was a note tucked to the side, so she pulled it out and read it. The gist of it was since the scissors were such a pricey and unique item, they were offering her a free premium item to try and entice her to join their premium membership and get discounts on items such as her scissors, or gain access to items such as the one in the smaller box. Jade rolled her eyes, but decided to check it out anyway

When she opened the box, what was inside?

1. A bottle with red liquid inside. Labeled as a shrinking serum.

2. A bottle with blue liquid inside. Labeled as a growth serum.

3. A strangely-shaped metal pistol that looks like some sort of sci-fi ray gun.
114.title: Jade West

1141.content:
Jade pulled out a glass bottle filled with a red, transparent liquid. The bottle's label said, "Shrinking Serum" and in smaller letters beneath, "Strawberry flavored!" Jade rolled her eyes. At the strawberry part, because she intrigued by the thought of some sort of shrinking potion.

"I wonder if you work..." she muttered to herself, wondering how she would find out. She figured she would slip some in somebody's drink and see if anything happened. But who should she test it on?

She could definitely imagine shrinking Tori. Or maybe even her boyfriend...but there were other options, too.
1141.title: Shrinking Serum

11413.content:
Jade thought some more. She could imagine shrinking Cat would be funny. The ditzy redhead would make for an adorable little pet.

Even though you wouldn't expect it, Jade had a secret reason for wanting to consider shrinking herself...it's not like her normally, to put herself in such a compromising, vulnerable position. But Jade has a reason.

But she also has more options. So what's she thinking?
11413.title: Choosing the Shrinkee

114132.content: It's very unlike Jade, but she does have a reason why she'd want to shrink herself. It's something no one else knows. What secret is Jade harboring?
114132.title: Jade's Secret Reason to Shrink

1141321.content:
(Author's Note: Not my typical thing, but it's a sort of request, so we'll see how it goes)

When Jade opened the box and saw they gave her a complimentary shrink potion essentially, she nearly dropped the box. She had been keeping a secret deep in her heart that she had never, ever told anyone. Not a living soul. Because she found it embarrassing, and knew it was so contrary to everything everyone knew about her. She was afraid of being ridiculed, she didn't handle embarrassment well.

Jade's big secret was that she secretly had a foot fetish. She was such a scary, domineering person who struck fear into the hearts of everyone who knew her. But her one secret weakness was feet. They made her weak.

Holding this shrinking serum in her hands brought her weakness to the forefront. If she drank this, she would shrink down to tiny size, she would be small, helpless, and at the mercy of the feet she desperately craved. She could serve them, and be a puny little foot slave. In her heart of hearts, it's what she felt she deserved to be...

Jade was internally struggling. Logically speaking this was the stupidest decision she could make. This potion does not indicate any time limit or way to grow back. There's no antidote as far as she's aware. She's almost certain a separate growth serum would need to be purchased to change her back, and from what she understood this shrinking serum was hard to get, so the growth serum would be too.

She knew it was stupid to uproot and completely change every aspect of her life, and become the extreme opposite of what everyone else saw. To go from a scary, socially-powerful teenage goth girl to a shrunken, pathetic little foot slave dutifully serving the feet of her master...It was the worst, most stupid possible decision.

But lust always wins, and Jade already found herself walking to her destination. She thought she was arguing with herself, but her legs were already carrying her forward to the decision she was trying not to make. Because she was going to make the decision. The shrinking serum was in her hand, and she was minutes away from drinking it and starting her new life. She left her new scissors behind, because she wouldn't need them anymore. Possessions were for big people, she was about to be nothing more than a tiny foot slave who had no use for things like that. Well, also, if she was small she couldn't operate them.

All that was left was to find the person she wished to serve. Their feet were the ones she lusted after most, the ones she most wished to serve and worship. She sneaked glances every chance she got, but now she felt as if she could fulfill her purpose. She thought it may be hard to convince them at first, but once they saw her dedication to their feet she was sure they would allow her her new position in life.

Whose feet did Jade desire to serve so badly?
1141321.title: Jade's Big Secret

choices: Jade just sips the growth serum. She grows to 15 feet tall
Jade takes a big drink of the growth serum. She grows to 50 feet tall
Jade sneaks some into a friend's drink to see how much they grow
1142.content:
Jade pulled out a glass bottle filled with a blue, transparent liquid. The bottle's label said, "Growth Serum" and in smaller letters beneath, "Blueberry flavored!" Jade rolled her eyes. At the blueberry part, because she intrigued by the thought of some sort of growth potion.

"I wonder if you work..." she muttered to herself, wondering how she would find out. She figured she would slip some in somebody's drink and see if anything happened. Or she could just drink some herself, she wouldn't mind being taller. But how much taller? She'd be pretty happy as either a goth amazon or a goth giantess, but knowing what would happen first would be ideal.

What does Jade do?
1142.title: Growth Serum

1143.content:
Jade pulled out the strange metal gun-thing. It looked just like the stereotypical comic book or old sci-fi movie ray gun. Jade's mind immediately went to thinking maybe it was a heat ray, or a freeze ray. She pictured melting someone's bike, or freezing a person solid. The thought brought a smile to her face.

But she inspected the ray gun further. It was a bit hefty, and very clearly made of metal, it wasn't just some cheap plastic toy. It had a dark purple grooved hand grip, a long, thin barrel with evenly-spaced purple discs along its length, and a small purple orb at the end, where she assumed the ray must fire from.

There was an off-white label on the side, what did it say?
1143.title: Ray Gun

11431.content:
It said "Size Ray" on the side, and there was a dial near the back, with two settings, "S" and "G." Currently, it was set to "S." Jade thought this was pretty straightforward, a ray gun that changed the size of things, assuming it worked. Well she was definitely going to try it out, and of course she was gonna try it out on a person.

Who does Jade look for to shoot with her size ray?
11431.title: Size Ray

114313.content:
Though of course firing it at her boyfriend or her rival Tori seemed like obvious choices, Jade was thinking more along the lines of...

Switching the dial to G and shooting herself. If this thing worked, she deserved to grow and be like a dark, goth goddess to this school. Or maybe...

Shooting her close friend Cat. Cat was...cute, but not the brightest. Sometimes she was as much like a pet as she was a friend. So Jade thought it might be amusing to make her the size of a pet and see what happened. Or maybe...grow her? Cat would make for an...interesting giantess, with her extremely playful and silly attitude...

Or maybe she has other ideas still...
114313.title: Whose Size to Change?

choices: She'll try it on Beck first...
11432.content:
The side of the ray gun said "Change Ray." As Jade held it in her hand, she could feel a slight buzzing, some sort of weird connection between her hand and the gun. No...it was more than thought, the change ray seemed to connect with her more deeply than that, it seemed as if it required more input than simply pulling the trigger to fire it...

Based on the brief description in its box, "Change anyone into anything!" and the fact that there was nothing else anywhere on the gun itself other than the trigger, she figured it must somehow be able to receive a signal from her brain. Which was weird, creepy, and a little too high-tech, but if it served her purposes then it would do.

Of course her first thought was this would be perfect to use on her rival, Tori. She relished the thought of reducing her annoying frenemy to nothing more than a pair of panties and wearing her all day. Or maybe she'd make her into a bra, and make her hold her boobs all day long. She could even make her into deodorant, and rub her into her armpits...the possibilities were endless...

Jade even considered she could turn Tori into something and give her to someone else, someone who had no idea...

But she also thought that perhaps Tori shouldn't be her first victim. Maybe she should try it on someone else first. Maybe Beck, her boyfriend, deserved to be put in his place. Or rewarded? Depended on what she turned him into, and how he felt about it...though she couldn't imagine being turned into an inanimate object would be all that enjoyable no matter what it was.

Anyway, what does Jade settle on?
11432.title: Change Ray

12.content: So one of the boys just got a package shipped to them from Sky Store. Which boy?
12.title: Victorious Boys

13.content:
There are several Hollywood Arts students we're very familiar with, but the school is full of students you've never heard of. Who shall we follow?

Kyra Lane
Kyra has a very light brown skin tone, and long dark brown hair. She's around 5'5", and has a more slender build. She got into Hollywood Arts for being an incredible dancer. Kyra is very outgoing and speaks her mind. She can be a bit feisty and loves teasing people.

James Way
James has lightly tanned skin and short black hair. He's about 5'9" and lean. He got into Hollywood Arts on the merits of his acting. James is fairly popular, and a relatively pleasant guy. But some find him annoying, and he's got a couple of ex-girlfriends who hate him.

Melody Evans
Melody has light skin and medium-length blonde hair. She's around 5'3" and a healthy weight. She got into Hollywood Arts for her singing voice, and yes she's heard that joke before. Melody is often pretty nice on the surface, but she holds grudges and can be kind of petty.

Jenny Wallace
Jenny has pale, freckled skin and long, red hair. She's about 5'10" and skinny. She got into Hollywood Arts for her writing talent, as she both writes scripts as well as songs. Jenny is often seen as pretty weird. Most still like her, but she's undeniably strange and has odd interests.

----

So with the custom students, you can kind of do what you want, maybe they interact with the main cast, maybe all the people they interact with are custom, maybe they only know custom people but are acquaintances or even good friends with just a single main cast member, whatever tickles your fancy, have fun with it. And feel free to write more custom options, I suck at them!

If you add to "More Options" and can only add two choices, go ahead and make two new custom characters, and then either message me or wait for me to add a third More Options choice. If you can add three or more choices yourself, then you won't need my help. Have fun!
13.title: Hollywood Arts Student

info.brief_description: Based on the Nickelodeon show. A spiritual revival of I <3 Band's Victorious interactive.
info.description:
I Band (thebandgeek)'s story with the same name was deleted on 6/15/20 along with their account.

This is not the same story and it will not be structured the same way, but it is inspired by and seeks to achieve the same goal as the original.

Rules:

1. Please do your best with your writing. If you need help with anything or need any typos fixed feel free to message me.

2. The original had a No Male Giants rule, and while male giants are not my thing personally, I see no reason to explicitly ban them. So male giants are allowed if that's your thing, however, if you are following a path with females and wish to add a male giant, please always allow a choice/path forward to avoid it. The same applies to the opposite scenario, for fairness.

3. I kinda hate scat, so preferably avoid it.

Other than that feel free to do whatever I guess. If something becomes a problem I will update the rules.

Note: You may be wondering why in certain sections I have added the option for either shrinking/growth serums or a size ray instead of just picking one and sticking with it. The answer is because I wanted to allow an option for people who enjoy stories with frequent size changing and the ability to "get revenge" if a tiny person gets regrown, hence the size ray. Also I'm thinking the serum/potion won't shrink/grow clothing and the size ray will.
